description: The addition of fig further enhances the sweet&nbsp;vermouth's botanical blend in Fig Manhattan. The contrast in this cocktail will pop with a decent, spicy rye&nbsp;whiskey.Caramelized fig syrup is also used in this recipe. The fig taste is intense and robust, making it a great match to spirits aged in barrels, such as whiskey and rum.
name: Fig Manhattan

recipeInstructions.name: Pour everything into a mixing glass filled with ice.
recipeInstructions.text: Pour everything into a mixing glass filled with ice.

recipeInstructions.name: After 20 seconds, strain into a chilled coupe.
recipeInstructions.text: After 20 seconds, strain into a chilled coupe.
